original_text: For, behold, we were binding sheaves in the field, and, lo, my sheaf arose, and also stood upright; and, behold, your sheaves stood round about, and made obeisance to my sheaf.
korean_text: 우리가 밭에서 곡식 단을 묶더니 내 단은 일어서고 당신들의 단은 내 단을 둘러서서 절하더이다

sentences.original_text: For, behold, we were binding sheaves in the field,
sentences.korean_translation: 보소서, 우리가 밭에서 곡식 단을 묶고 있었는데,

sentences.original_text: and, behold, your sheaves stood round about,
and made obeisance to my sheaf.
